TopicTitle: Bolder co not working in Krags Planetfactory

Articles.Content: Hi guys i have created a new planet in space engine wrote the config file and installed krags planet factory. But when the game loaded up there was nothing! not even the little photo at the top of the screen, please help!
You might want to know that PlanetFactory got abadoned over two years ago and that Kopernicus has become the standard way to add planets.
I'd also recommend this guide for learning to use Kopernicus. It's really helpful!
No NO NOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!! How am i to upload the planet now!? NOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

You remake it with Kopernicus, of course. Then you can upload it as a mod just fine.

(Remember to review the mod submission guidelines before you do.)
